ResumeParserData.Experience: Marketing Manager  Unilever, Manchester, UK  June 2014 - Present  As a Marketing Manager, I lead the development and execution of marketing campaigns that increased brand awareness by 25%. I manage digital marketing strategies, including SEO, PPC, and social media, resulting in a 30% increase in online engagement. I oversee content creation for various platforms, ensuring consistency and alignment with brand guidelines. Additionally, I conduct market research to identify trends and opportunities, informing our marketing strategies. I manage a team of five marketing professionals, fostering a collaborative and innovative environment.  Marketing Specialist  Procter & Gamble, Manchester, UK  August 2010 - May 2014  I developed and implemented marketing strategies to promote various product lines, created and managed content for digital and traditional marketing channels, and conducted market analysis to inform product development and positioning. I collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment of marketing initiatives with business goals.  Marketing Coordinator  Nestl�, Manchester, UK  October 2006 - July 2010  In this role, I assisted in the planning and execution of marketing campaigns, created content for marketing materials, and conducted market research to support marketing strategies. I also coordinated events and promotions to increase brand visibility.

ResumeParserData.DetailResume:
David Thompson
Address : 21 Birch Avenue, Manchester, UK
Phone : +44 9988 776655
Email : david.thompson@example.com
LinkedIn : linkedin.com/in/davidthompson

Personal Statement
Marketing Specialist with over 10 years of experience in developing and executing successful marketing campaigns. Expertise in digital marketing, content creation, and market research. Seeking to apply my marketing skills in a new and challenging environment.

Professional Experience
Marketing Manager
Unilever, Manchester, UK
June 2014 - Present
As a Marketing Manager, I lead the development and execution of marketing campaigns that increased brand awareness by 25%. I manage digital marketing strategies, including SEO, PPC, and social media, resulting in a 30% increase in online engagement. I oversee content creation for various platforms, ensuring consistency and alignment with brand guidelines. Additionally, I conduct market research to identify trends and opportunities, informing our marketing strategies. I manage a team of five marketing professionals, fostering a collaborative and innovative environment.
Marketing Specialist
Procter & Gamble, Manchester, UK
August 2010 - May 2014
I developed and implemented marketing strategies to promote various product lines, created and managed content for digital and traditional marketing channels, and conducted market analysis to inform product development and positioning. I collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment of marketing initiatives with business goals.
Marketing Coordinator
Nestl�, Manchester, UK
October 2006 - July 2010
In this role, I assisted in the planning and execution of marketing campaigns, created content for marketing materials, and conducted market research to support marketing strategies. I also coordinated events and promotions to increase brand visibility.

Education
BA in Marketing
University of Manchester, Manchester, UK
2002 - 2006

Skills
Digital Marketing : Proficient in SEO, PPC, social media, and email marketing.
Content Creation : Skilled in creating engaging and relevant content.
Market Research : Strong ability to conduct and analyze market research.
Campaign Management : Experienced in planning and executing successful marketing campaigns.
Team Leadership : Effective team leader with excellent interpersonal skills.

Personal Attributes
Creative Thinking : Innovative and creative approach to marketing challenges.
Collaborative Nature : Strong team player with excellent communication skills.
Analytical Mindset : Ability to analyze data and market trends to inform strategies.
Proactive Approach : Highly motivated and proactive in identifying opportunities for improvement.

AMS - Confidential
